title: IPBES Appendix 2.2 Reconstruction
text:
This is the Quarto project to redo the indicator analysis of the IPBES Appendix 2.2 (insert reference here). This is a private project; IPBES takes no responsibility for its content.
This project requires the following packages:
library(ipbesIApackage)
library(kableExtra)
library(knitr)

title: IPBES Appendix 2.2 Reconstruction
text:
Summary of indicators
In the following a brief overview of the indicators used so far will be given by Table 1.




Table 1: Summary of indicators used in this synthesis organised alphabetically within EBV class (and, where relevant, EBV scale). Core/Highlight/Other denotes the Knowledge & Data TSUâ€™s evaluation of each indicator. Whole or Part of indicator denotes whether the row of the table refers to an overall indicator (e.g., Red List Index) or a subset (e.g., Red List Index of pollinators).
